title: Dinosaur National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education      Dinosaur National Monument offers a variety of resources and places that can serve as an outdoor classroom. Teachers can provide educational experiences for students through either self-guided activities or ranger-guided education programs. Activity topics include, but are not limited to:  dinosaur and other fossilspaleontology geology river ecology desert shrub ecosystemsendangered species Fremont Culture pioneer homesteading  For more information call (435) 781-7701.
